{{title}}

dbFlux has just created the directory structure.
Underneath db/_setup you will now find the following file(s):

    {{#each this.files}}
  • {{{this}}}
    • {{/each}}

If you still have to create the schemas or users, run the corresponding scripts with Ctrl+Alt+B or cmd: dbFlux:Compile current file.
Or just run {{installFile}} which will execute all generated files. Of course, you can adjust them manually before running.

Attention

Be carfull:
Existing Users / Schemas will be dropped !!!

{{userFile}} was automatically added to .gitignore, because the password you specified was saved inside that file

Have fun developing with dbFlux.

You can find more documentation on github at: https://github.com/MaikMichel/dbFlux
